item.description:
Crowne Plaza SINGLES DANCE Nashua
Friday April, 27th. 8pm.
8:00 PM to 1 am.
Crowne Plaza
exit 8 off of rt. 3
Nashua, NH 03061

Proper attire is required. No jeans or sneakers, no work boots

Cover Charge goes from $12 to $15 after 9 pm.

Host: Neil Lewis.

Please join Neil L. and about 20 to 50+ friends for an evening of dancing and socializing. This is the largest Singles Dances in NH, with between 200 and 300 singles, in a ballroom setting. Yet, this is not a Ballroom Dance. So, all you need to do is just shake it to dance here. This dance has the most tasteful variety of people and mix of ages you will find anywhere. Please get there as close to 8 pm as possible.Â  Because of the popularity of this dance, tables and seats will be hard to hold, much past 8:30. Plus, we have the only reserved tables there. Also, if you are late? The Cover Charge goes from $12 to $15 after 9 pm.

Ask where Neil L., or Meetup is sitting as you pay at the door. They will show you where we are sitting. Also look for our signs on our tables.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for My Meetup Sign or ask for Neil.
item.name: Together Singles Dance
